name: Gift Sort Game
description:
Sort gifts at night and avoid Frosty.

How To Play

Pick up gifts, sort them to their corresponding machine, and do that a few times. Frosty lurks right outside so every once in a while, check the front door to see if it's open, and if it is, close it as soon as possible. Sometimes the power will go out, so you'll have to go to the bottom floor and reset the generator before you can proceed to sort gifts. once you collect enough gifts, interact with the front door to leave.

Controls

A / Left Key / D / Right Key - Moving left or right

W / Up Key - Interact

S / Down Key - Drop Gift

Thats it

I'm Finally freed from this game.
